name: DeleteZoomRecordings
description:
Delete a meeting or webinar's cloud recordings.

Use this tool to delete all cloud recordings of a specified Zoom meeting or webinar. Ensure that Cloud Recording is enabled on the user's account. Appropriate scopes are needed for this operation.

parameters.name: meeting_or_webinar_identifier
parameters.description: Provide the meeting or webinar ID/UUID to delete its cloud recordings. If using a UUID starting with '/' or containing '//', double encode it.

value_schema.description:
To get a meeting's cloud recordings, provide the meeting ID or meeting UUID. If the meeting ID is provided instead of UUID, the response will be for the latest meeting instance. 

To get a webinar's cloud recordings, provide the webinar ID or the webinar UUID. If the webinar ID is provided instead of UUID, the response will be for the latest webinar instance. 

If a UUID starts with `/` or contains `//`, like `/ajXp112QmuoKj4854875==`, you must **double encode** the UUID before making an API request.

parameters.name: recording_delete_action
parameters.description: Specify the action for deleting recordings: `trash` to move to trash or `delete` for permanent removal.

value_schema.description:
The recording delete actions.  
 `trash` - Move recording to trash.  
 `delete` - Delete recording permanently.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description:
The recording delete actions.  
 `trash` - Move recording to trash.  
 `delete` - Delete recording permanently.

value_schema.description:

 `trash` - Move recording to trash.  
 `delete` - Delete recording permanently.

If a UUID starts with `/` or contains `//`, like `/ajXp112QmuoKj4854875==`, you must **double encode** the UUID before making an API request.
